Description: Pottery ostracon bearing Coptic. Contains Eucharistic prayer, 'Prayer of the bread'.
Curator's comments: EA 5876 + EA 14180 (+ P.Berol. 1086) Under study with a view to publication by A. Mihálykó 2021.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.24, pl.18)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (111811) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/111811)
Mihálykó 2015 / Witness of a 'prayer for offering' in Sahidic from the White Monastery and the Thebaid
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 18:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2009)
